missionDescription: Define a single entrypoint (e.g., `make all` or `python -m build`) that (1) validates schemas, (2) runs a placeholder meta-analysis pipeline, and (3) writes a dated build log + checksum manifest into `/outputs/build_logs/`.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete the urgent task identified by Meta-Coordinator
